title: uche6215
author: uche6215
content: I will like to know the time duration it takes for a post to appears in https://ninjastic.space/. There sometimes members would post something and after posting they would discovered that they have done mistake so they went back and clicked edit to edit the post and saved it back again so I want to know if the two post appear in ninjastic.space or only the last post? Or the first post will also be the as well? Or there is a time frame that a post set to appear in the ninjastic.space so when the time has not elapsed and you edit your post, it is the last edited post will appear there since the time as not elapsed.

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: A few seconds (usually less than 5).And then any change found after 5 minutes will be shown under the post (“post history”). Changes made after 5 minutes won’t show up.

comments.author: uche6215
comments.body: Quote from: TryNinja on July 11, 2023, 04:42:45 AMA few seconds (usually less than 5).And then any change found after 5 minutes will be shown under the post (“post history”).Okay thank you for the instant respond. Since I have gotten the answer from the source there is no need to open this thread for further discussion therefore I hereby lock the thread.
